JSON blobs in Azure Blob Storage or Azure File Storage commonlyassume any of these forms:A single JSON documentA JSON document containing an array of well-formed JSON elementsA JSON document containing multiple entities, separated by a newlineThe blob indexer provides a "parsingMode" parameter to optimize the output of thesearch document based on the structure.
